message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $140 is too high for me. I'm interested, but only if I can get it closer to market value.
I understand that $80 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a great deal at $105
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we settle at $95?
I'm still a bit above the market value, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you a deal at $100
